org.gradle.platform.base

Interface Library

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Component
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    JvmLibrary, NativeLibrary, PrebuiltLibrary

    @Incubating
public interface Library
extends Component
    A library that can be linked into or depended on by another software element.
